clinical_study.brief_title: Role of B Mode and Color Doppler Sonography in Differentiation Between Pleural Neoplasm and Inflammatory Pleural Thickening in Correlation With CT Findings
clinical_study.official_title: Role of B Mode and Color Doppler Sonography in Differentiation Between Pleural Neoplasm and Inflammatory Pleural Thickening in Correlation With CT Findings

brief_summary.textblock:
pleura is a serous membrane, it consist of parietal pleura and visceral pleura. pleural thickening is any form of thickening involving the pleura more than 3 mm.
there is malignant thickening : methoselioma, metastasis and non malignant thickening.
trans thoracic USn is a reliable , safe and gold standard for studying pleura.

primary_outcome.measure: sensitivity of sonography in pleural thickening in comparison to CT and histopathology
primary_outcome.description: sensitivity of sonography in cases of pleural thickening in comparison to CT findings and histopathology

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Adult patients diagnosed as having pleural thickening with or without pleural effusion.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Emphysema or contraindication to pleural biopsy
